fn.p: Competing Interests: We have the following interests: Claudia Cordel is affiliated with ExecuVet Veterinary Clinical and Scientific Consulting. ExecuVet Veterinary Clinical and Scientific Consulting is a private company that was hired as a subcontractor to implement aspects of the research related to field data collection. They made no contributions toward funding this project. There are no patents, products in development or marketed products to declare. This does not alter our adherence to all the PLOS ONE policies on sharing data and materials.
